chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
v: nat
c: nat
q: nat
l: nat

Goal:
Const c v <-> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ v = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists p u u1 : nat, p = power q 2 /\ c < p /\ seqs_of_ones u u1 /\ v = c * u)

Premises:
seqs_of_ones = fun u u1 : nat => l + 1 < q /\ u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r) /\ u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments seqs_of_ones (_ _)%nat_scope
Const = fun c v : nat => exists f : nat -> nat, is_cipher_of f v /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i = c) : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Const (_ _)%nat_scope
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Code_dio : forall a : nat, Code a < -> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ a = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists p u u1 : nat, p + 1 = power q 2 /\ seqs_of_ones u u1 /\ a ≲ p * u)
seqs_of_ones_dio : forall u u1 : nat, seqs_of_ones u u1 < -> l = 0 /\ u = 0 /\ u1 = 0 /\ 2 <= q \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists u2 w r0 r1 p1 p2 : nat, r0 = r /\ r1 + 1 = r0 /\ p1 = power (1 + l) 2 /\ p2 = power p1 r0 /\ 1 + r1 * w = r0 * p2 /\ u * u = u1 + u2 /\ u1 = u * u ⇣ w /\ u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) /\ r0 * r0 + u1 = u + p2 /\ divides (r0 * r0 * r0 * r0) u1)
is_cipher_of_const_1 : forall u : nat, 0 < l -> is_cipher_of (fun _ : nat => 1) u < -> l + 1 < q /\ (exists u1 : nat, seqs_of_ones u u1)
const1_cn : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall u u1 : nat, u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (4 * q) 2)) ->...-> exists w u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) /\ u * u = u1 + u2 /\ u1 = u * u ⇣ w /\ u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) /\ power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) /\ divides (power 4 (power (4 * q) 2)) u1
mk_full : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall w u u1 u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) -> u * u = u1 + u2 -> u1 = u * u ⇣ w -> u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) ->...-> nat | u1 = ∑ (S m) (fun i : nat => power (k i) (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ m <= power (S l) 2 /\ (forall i : nat, i < S m -> k i <= power (S l) 2) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < S m -> k i < k j)}}
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
obtain_u_u1_value : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall w u u1 u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) -> u * u = u1 + u2 -> u1 = u * u ⇣ w -> u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) -> power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) ->...-> u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) (power (4 * q) 2))
is_cipher_of_0 : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat), l = 0 -> is_cipher_of f a < -> 1 < q /\ a = 0
binary_power_split : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}
is_cipher_of = fun (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat) => l + 1 < q /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i < power q 2) /\ a = ∑ l (fun i : nat => f i * power (power (S i) 2) r) : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_cipher_of _%function_scope _%nat_scope
power_0_inv : forall p n : nat, power p n = 0 < -> n = 0 /\ 0 < p
const_u1_prefix : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> {q0 : nat | q0 <= m /\ u * u ⇣ w = ∑ q0 (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))}
div_rem_uniq : forall p n1 r1 n2 r2 : nat, p <> 0 -> n1 * p + r1 = n2 * p + r2 -> r1 < p -> r2 < p -> n1 = n2 /\ r1 = r2
mult_lt_power_2 : forall u v k : nat, u < power k 2 -> v < power k 2 -> u * v < power (2 * k) 2
const_u1_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
binary_le_mult_power2_inv : forall m x q : nat, m ≲ x * power q 2 -> m <> 0 -> {y : nat | m = y * power q 2 /\ y <> 0 /\ y ≲ x}
const_u2_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) ->...-> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
power_plus_lt : forall a b c : nat, a < b < c -> power a 2 + power b 2 < power c 2
all_ones_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
all_ones_2_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 2 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c
sum_powers_binary_le_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = ∑ k (fun i : nat => g i * power (e (h i)) r) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
binary_le_power_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a b : nat, a ≲ b * power i r -> {a' : nat | a = a' * power i r /\ a' ≲ b}
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
binary_le_joins_inv : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 k g /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
Hu1 : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
const_u1_eq : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> u * u ⇣ w = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
Hseq_u : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> forall a : nat, a <= m -> ∑ a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
const_u_square : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u * u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) + ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))

```coq
Hint Resolve const_u1_eq const_u1_meet const_u2_meet const_u_square.

Lemma Const_c_v: Const c v <-> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ v = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists p u u1 : nat, p = power q 2 /\ c < p /\ seqs_of_ones u u1 /\ v = c * u).
Proof.
split.
- intros [H|H].
  + subst l. simpl. auto.
  + destruct H as [Hl Hq Hc].
    apply seqs_of_ones_dio in Hl.
    destruct Hl as [Hl1 Hl2].
    destruct Hl2 as [Hu1 Hw].
    exists (power q 2). exists Hu1. exists w.
    split; auto.
    + omega.
    + destruct (bezout_rel_prime_lt q (power q 2) l Hl Hq) as [a [b [H1 H2]]].
      exists a. exists b. split; auto.
      apply power_0_inv in H1.
      subst a. apply plus_cancel_l in H2.
      destruct H2 as [H2 H3].
      rewrite H2 in H3. simpl in H3.
      destruct (obtain_u_u1_value l q w Hu1 Hw) as [H4 [H5 [H6 H7]]].
      exists Hu1. exists w. exists u1.
      split; auto.
      + rewrite H4. simpl. auto.
      + rewrite H4. simpl. auto.
- intros [H|H].
  + destruct H as [Hl Hq Hv].
    apply seqs_of_ones_dio in Hl.
    destruct Hl as [Hl1 Hl2].
    destruct Hl2 as [Hu1 Hw].
    exists (power q 2). exists Hu1. exists w.
    split; auto.
    + omega.
    + destruct (bezout_rel_prime_lt q (power q 2) l Hl Hq) as [a [b [H1 H2]]].
      exists a. exists b. split; auto.
      apply power_0_inv in H1.
      subst a. apply plus_cancel_l in H2.
      destruct H2 as [H2 H3].
      rewrite H2 in H3. simpl in H3.
      destruct (obtain_u_u1_value l q w Hu1 Hw) as [H4 [H5 [H6 H7]]].
      exists Hu1. exists w. exists u1.
      split; auto.
      + rewrite H4. simpl. auto.
      + rewrite H4. simpl. auto.
```

original: Hint Resolve const_u1_eq const_u1_meet const_u2_meet const_u_square.
